original_text: Then the soldiers fixed Jesus onto the cross. They took his clothes for themselves. They played a game to decide which soldier would receive each of his clothes.
korean_text: 십자가에 못 박고 그 옷을 나눌새 누가 어느 것을 가질까 하여 제비를 뽑더라

sentences.original_text: Then the soldiers fixed Jesus onto the cross
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 군인들은 예수님을 십자가에 못 박았습니다

sentences.original_text: They took his clothes for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 옷을 자신들을 위해 가져갔습니다

sentences.original_text: to decide which soldier would receive each of his clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 군인이 그의 옷 각각을 받을지 결정하기 위해
